trans-unit.source: Provides helper methods for marshaling data between the .NET Framework and the Windows Runtime.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona los métodos auxiliares para la serialización de datos entre .NET Framework y Windows Runtime.

trans-unit.source: The type of the delegate that represents the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Tipo de delegado que representa el controlador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: A delegate that represents the method that adds event handlers to the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] event.
trans-unit.target: Delegado que representa el método que agrega controladores de eventos al evento de [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A delegate that represents the method that removes event handlers from the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] event.
trans-unit.target: Delegado que representa el método que quita controladores de eventos del evento de [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A delegate the represents the event handler that is added.
trans-unit.target: Delegado que representa el controlador de eventos que se agrega.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified event handler to a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] event.
trans-unit.target: Agrega el controlador de eventos especificado a un evento de [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] .

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="addMethod" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="addMethod" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="removeMethod" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="removeMethod" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requiere plena confianza para el llamador inmediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro no puede usarse por código de confianza parcial o transparente.

trans-unit.source: The address of the [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) to free.
trans-unit.target: Dirección del [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) que se va a liberar.

trans-unit.source: Frees the specified [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)][HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451).
trans-unit.target: Libera el [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)][HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) especificado.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] is not supported on the current version of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] no es compatible con esta versión actual del sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requiere plena confianza para el llamador inmediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro no puede usarse por código de confianza parcial o transparente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] type to get the activation factory interface for.
trans-unit.target: El tipo de [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] para el que se va a obtener la interfaz de generador de activaciones.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that implements the activation factory interface for the specified [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] type.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un objeto que implementa la interfaz del generador de activación para el tipo de [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] especificado.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the activation factory interface.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa la interfaz de generador de activación.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the exceptions in the Exceptions section, any `HRESULT` other than `S_OK` that is returned by the underlying factory method will be marshaled as an exception.
trans-unit.target: Además de las excepciones en la sección excepciones, cualquier `HRESULT` distinto de `S_OK` que se devuelve por el generador subyacente método se convierte en una excepción.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> does not represent a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] type (that is, belonging to the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] itself or defined in a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> no representa un tipo de [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] (es decir, perteneciente a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] propiamente dicho o definido en un componente de [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]).

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: The object specified for <paramref name="type" /> was not provided by the common language runtime type system.
trans-unit.target: El sistema de tipos de Common Language Runtime no proporcionó el objeto especificado para <paramref name="type" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The specified [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] class is not properly registered.
trans-unit.target: La clase de [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] especificada no está registrada correctamente.

trans-unit.source: For example, the .winmd file was located, but the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] failed to locate the implementation.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el archivo .winmd se ha buscado, pero [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] no pudo buscar la implementación.

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requiere plena confianza para el llamador inmediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro no puede usarse por código de confianza parcial o transparente.

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to the [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) to copy.
trans-unit.target: Puntero no administrado al valor [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) que se va a copiar.

trans-unit.source: Returns a managed string that contains a copy of the specified [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)][HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451).
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una cadena administrada que contiene una copia del valor [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)][HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) especificado.

trans-unit.source: A managed string that contains a copy of the [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) if <paramref name="ptr" /> is not <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />; otherwise, <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: Cadena administrada que contiene una copia del valor [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) si <paramref name="ptr" /> no es <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />; en caso contrario, <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] is not supported on the current version of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] no es compatible con esta versión actual del sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requiere plena confianza para el llamador inmediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro no puede usarse por código de confianza parcial o transparente.

trans-unit.source: A delegate that represents the method that removes event handlers from the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] event.
trans-unit.target: Delegado que representa el método que quita controladores de eventos del evento de [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Removes all the event handlers that can be removed by using the specified method.
trans-unit.target: Quita todos los controladores de eventos que se pueden quitar mediante el método especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="removeMethod" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="removeMethod" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requiere plena confianza para el llamador inmediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro no puede usarse por código de confianza parcial o transparente.

trans-unit.source: The type of the delegate that represents the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Tipo de delegado que representa el controlador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: A delegate that represents the method that removes event handlers from the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] event.
trans-unit.target: Delegado que representa el método que quita controladores de eventos del evento de [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The event handler that is removed.
trans-unit.target: Controlador de eventos que se va a quitar.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified event handler from a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] event.
trans-unit.target: Quita el controlador de eventos especificado de un evento [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="removeMethod" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="removeMethod" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requiere plena confianza para el llamador inmediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro no puede usarse por código de confianza parcial o transparente.

trans-unit.source: The managed string to copy.
trans-unit.target: Cadena administrada que se va a copiar.

trans-unit.source: Allocates a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)][HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) and copies the specified managed string to it.
trans-unit.target: Asigna un valor [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)][HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) y copia la cadena administrada especificada en él.

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to the new [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451), or <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> if <paramref name="s" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: Puntero no administrado al nuevo valor [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) o <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> si <paramref name="s" /> es <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.WindowsRuntimeMarshal.FreeHString%2A> method to release the [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) when you are done using it.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.WindowsRuntimeMarshal.FreeHString%2A> método para liberar la [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) cuando haya terminado con él.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] is not supported on the current version of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] no es compatible con esta versión actual del sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requiere plena confianza para el llamador inmediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro no puede usarse por código de confianza parcial o transparente.
